name: The W Is Permanent
description:
The title says it all

*SPOILERS*But if you would like to know more, this game is a lot like real life; most things you touch will give you a special power, powers move in a counter-clockwise rotation when you touch the clock, the arrows will cycle through objects for the Conic Shift power in a roughly clockwise fashion, and the stairs allow you to leave the game. *END SPOILERS*

Music by John Denver, LLC

Inspired by thecatamites, specifically 50 Short Games and Veggie Tales 3D

Thanks for stopping by!
